Allright, as Kinger said, the defences are firing at Megs' troops. 
The good of that is under question, as Megs' troops are at the engine 
rooms and can make quite a boom, but they're firing.

Lets just play this out, not improvise diplomacy.

::Killfest/EndBringer/Scyther/Greven/Demise/GoldenEye/DarkMouse::

Killfest frowns. "Attacking the engine room can be very suicidal. One 
stray shot and we are all dead."

A command from his internal communication system sends Demise, Greven 
and Scyther heading to the bridge, and EndBringer to him.

"Demise, Greven, and Scyther will aid in the attack of the engine 
room. I don't recommend sending EndBringer there, he is not easily 
calmed. And having over-excited troops in the engine room isn't a 
good thing."

Darkmouse jumps up, her gun ready. "Do ya want me to go attack to?" 
she asks hopefully.

"No, you're too valuable to lose. We'll need you here controlling the 
defences."

Grumbling, Darkmouse sits down. Killfest looks at DrillBit. "I think 
we should help in this attack as well. I, for one, am eager to gut 
this Megatron."

He turns his head as GoldenEye runs into the room. She was breathing 
heavily.

"Hey, commander," she says to DrillBit between breaths, "What do you 
want me to do?"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He turned to Apoc, and looked at him through the door hatch.
> "Megatron and most of his forces are in the engine room, attemptine 
to
> take computer control. Witch he cant because that network is tied in
> with Dark Mouse's spark. I say we attack the engine room. but your
> tactic of attack is sound."
> He then turns to Killfest.
> "Order all your troops to join us. I'll do the same. We'll attack 
the
> engine room wave after wave. Inform them to kill any of Meg's troops
> they encounter on the way."
> He turns back to StarScream and Dollon.
> "You guys stick with me. We're command team Alpha. Killfest, take a
> couple of your guys. Have them with you at all times. We cant avord 
to
> loose a commander. Not again. You'll be command team Beta.
> Once we have are troops set we'll attack."
